title: Rengar's ult needs a global noise.
body:
"You get a global noise with Rek'Sai, Sion and Nocturne, and you get tons of warning time on top of the fact that they can't instakill you."

This is true.

i know right also unlike the ults you mentioned he doesnt travel anywhere near as fast or far on cast(he still has to walk to the target till he gets in leap range) and can be spotted out by  pink wards/sweeper and cannot just fly through walls..

First off, Rengar's ultimate is not **_GLOBAL_** what so ever. Giving his ultimate a global noise defeats the whole purpose of **_stealth_**. They already give you a warning symbol over the enemy champions head that warns you Rengar is nearing!
I have been playing rengar a lot recently, and this would nerf him crazily. His ult is not even global
and nocturnes ultimate has a global effect while reksai can travel anywhere on the map where she has a tunnel so id say thats a valid use of global sounds

I can see this being good, but only if they remove the exclamation mark.

And it would be considered a buff.
ok then, just make him visible, no!?!?!? pls learn to ward and group

can we please just nerf rengar? the fact he can kill a squishy in literally 1 auto is stupidly broken. and dont say he cant because you know when he ults and you all try to defend your ADC and then rengar shows up and boom adc is dead before you can put your mouse on him
